snippet.title: Blue Prince - Official Narrative Trailer | ID@Xbox
snippet.description:
Blue Prince gets a new trailer and a release date during the ID@Xbox showcase. Check out the latest Blue Prince trailer to see gameplay and learn more about the story of this upcoming strategy puzzle adventure game. Welcome to Mt. Holly, where every dawn unveils a new mystery. Navigate through shifting corridors and ever-changing chambers. But will your unpredictable path lead you to the rumored Room 46? 

Blue Prince will be available on PC (Steam), Windows, Game Pass, and Xbox Series X/S on April 10, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
